    <plugin filename="libnexus_ros_force_based_move.so" name="nexus_ros_force_based_move">

      <odometryTopic>odom</odometryTopic>

    </plugin>

       the one to apply the colour to (in Gazebo 5+). -->

      <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
      <visualize>false</visualize>
      <ray>

            <samples>2</samples>
            <resolution>1</resolution>
            <min_angle>-0.52</min_angle>
            <max_angle> 0.52</max_angle>
          </horizontal>
          <vertical>
            <samples>2</samples>
            <resolution>1</resolution>
            <min_angle>-0.02</min_angle>
            <max_angle> 0.02</max_angle>
          </vertical>
        </scan>
        <range>
          <min>0.04</min>
          <max>2.5</max>
          <resolution>0.01</resolution>
        </range>
      </ray>
      <plugin filename="libhector_gazebo_ros_sonar.so" name="gazebo_ros_front_sensor">
        <gaussianNoise>0.005</gaussianNoise>
        <topicName>front_sensor</topicName>
        <frameId>front_sensor</frameId>
      </plugin>
    </sensor>
  </gazebo>
